subtitle: A delicious dessert the kids could make.

method.text: Mix together the butter and golden syrup. Stir in the muesli and coconut. Spoon the mixture onto a baking tray. Place under a preheated moderate grill for 1-2 min, stirring occasionally, until golden.
Press the mixture down into a greased 23 cm / 9in round flan dish. Set aside to cool.
Sprinkle the raspberries and blackberries over the cooled muesli mixture.
Mix the yogurt in a bowl until smooth. Fold in the whipped cream. Spoon over the fruit mixutre and smooth to the edges.
Press the remaining raspberries through a sieve. Drizzle the resulting puree over the cream and swirl with a cocktail stick.
Chill until required. Spoon onto serving plates.

title: Raspberry and blackberry scrunch
